infos.value: In Multi Quests, you can either join together with or compete against others who have gathered in the Farplane.
Additionally, you can sometimes receive Multi Medals for completing Multi Quests.
Furthermore, you will obtain First Meeting Bonuses when fighting with or against another player for the first time.
There is a unique amusement found in the joint struggle with other players that you cannot experience on your own. I am certain that you will enjoy it.
Multi Quests are where you <color=#00ffff>play</color> in <color=#00ffff>real time</color> with <color=#00ffff>other players</color> to complete a quest.

A <color=#00ffff>maximum of four players</color> can participate with <color=#00ffff>each player controlling one unit</color> during the quest. (There are also modes where two participating players can each control two units.)
Like normal quests, Multi Quests have an <color=#00ffff>NRG cost</color>. (The NRG cost applies only to the host.)
<color=#00ffff>Multi Medals</color> can be <color=#00ffff>exchanged</color> for rare items at the Multi Medal Exchange Shop.
You can acquire <color=#00ffff>Visiore</color> as a <color=#00ffff>reward</color> when playing <color=#00ffff>with another player for the first time</color>!
Proceed to a tutorial on Multi Quests?
